SEARCH
Package com.example.segfaultsquadapplication

Class MockDb

java.lang.Object
com.example.segfaultsquadapplication.MockDb
public class MockDb extends Object
This class will help setup mock database before unit tests.
Initialize an instance of this class before doing tests to wire things appropriately.
WARNING: This DB impl is simple and mimics the actual firebase for mock unit tests only.
Objects are stored as-is in the internal environment; DO NOT modify instances after adding them.

  • Method Details

    • await

      public static void await(Function<Runnable,Runnable> method) throws InterruptedException
      Helper method that helps wait for a DB operation in unit test to finish, then continue with next logics.
      method will behave as a proxy to inject shouldProceed logic as additional logic in the desired callback.
      Parameters:
      method - The proxy for extra behavior to mark for continue
      Throws:
      InterruptedException

    • wireTransaction

      private void wireTransaction(com.google.firebase.firestore.FirebaseFirestore mockDb)
      Mocks the transaction method for the entire database. ONLY WIRED UP UPDATE METHODS as they are the ones being used in the project.
      Parameters:
      mockDb - The database to wire.

    • initMockDocRef

      private com.google.firebase.firestore.DocumentReference initMockDocRef(com.google.firebase.firestore.CollectionReference mockColl, String docId)
      Helper function for wireNewDocOp - creates a mock document reference.
      NOTE: The document content is saved in wireNewDocOp - this only creates the reference.
      Parameters:
      mockColl - The collection to mock
      docId - Document id
      Returns:
      The new document reference

    • formulateQuery

      private com.google.firebase.firestore.Query formulateQuery(com.google.firebase.firestore.CollectionReference mockColl)
      Forms a query object from the collection.
      Further operations modify the query content IN-PLACE As the results are held internally via hashmap.
      Parameters:
      mockColl - The mock collection.
      Returns:
      The query object that returns the entire collection.

    • quickSort

      private <T, D extends Comparable<D>> void quickSort(List<T> data, Function<T,D> cast, com.google.firebase.firestore.Query.Direction dir, int start, int postEnd)
      Quick sort used in order-by of formulateQuery. Sorts the document references in-place.
      Parameters:
      data - The list of raw data.
      cast - The adapter to cast data to a comparable object.
      dir - The direction - ascending or descending.
      start - The start index, inclusive.
      postEnd - The end index, exclusive.
